# drporthelp

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of drporthelp is to display my skill in building a package and creating functions. It is used in my personal online portfolio to take on some of the duplicate code.

## Installation

You can install the released version of drporthelp from [github](https://github.com/DanielRoodzantHU/drporthelp)

``` r
install.packages("https://github.com/DanielRoodzantHU/drporthelp")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("DanielRoodzantHU/drporthelp")
```
